short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to support etrain.info to provide advanced features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides secure access functionality exclusively for the website etrain.info.

Note: This extension provides functionality only to etrain.info website and will remain inactive on other websites. Install it only if you are a user of etrain.info and have been prompted to install the extension to access secure features.
